face too that same indication of something new and stern showed round the mouth. 
"Who's that curtseying there? Cadet Miw6- nov! That's not wight! Look at me," cried Denfsov who, unable to keep still on one spot, kept turning his horse in front of the squadron. 
The black, hairy, snub-nosed face of Vdska Denhov,and his whole short sturdy figure with the sinewy hairy hand and stumpy fingers in which he held the hilt of his naked saber, looked just as it usually did, especially toward evening wh
